title: looking for- a piece of a T206 Honus Wagner
author: mrvster

posts.post_title: looking for- a piece of a T206 Honus Wagner
posts.post_content:
ok.....I know this sounds a little silly and this is a longshot!

I have been looking for a Wagner since I have been 11 years old..... many of you know me and this has been a lifelong quest and my dream.......  I am a realist and an ordinary guy, but have been collecting 206 for many years....I am at the point of hoping for a trade for just a piece of the Wagner, a 1/2 or 1/4 wagner, or something of that nature....I'm not sure if they even exist??? I have seen on the resource the die cut and 1/2 wagner ect....i can not even dream of an A or anything close like that, but just looking for a piece of the card...


big longshot.....

if you, or anyone you can put me in touch, please pm me...

Thanks a ton

:)

Johnny

Johnny V! One of these is out there for you.

Chris!!!

I am trying to find one of these!!!

HELP

:):):)

call me!  miss you brother!

somebody help me fullfill my lifetime dream:D my whole lifetime collection will go for one of these chopped up!
